title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Probability Theory, Statistical definitions, Combinatorial properties, Conditional probability and its use in the analysis of dependent failures. Discrete and continuous random variables and associated distributions, moments. Markov Models, Poisson process. Several random variables, moment generating functions. Estimation Theory, several estimators and their properties. Solution of differential equations arising in reliability studies, Laplace transform methods. Random number generation, Monte Carlo simulation.
